Html:
Does anyone have any opinions/experiences about ISPs for hosting the club starter kit (with modifications)? I am working with three organizations who need an ISP for this ...

discountasp.net charges $10/mo for the site and another $10/mo for the database (and do not recommend using SQL express for security reasons - they have some sort of upgrade process to SQL 2005).
Ultima Hosts should be cheaper than $20 a month. Plus you can get 25% off (as detailed on this page: http://www.webhostingunleashed.com/ultima-hosts/coupons)

marvalus-domains-hosting.com has great rates on hosting. You can get hosting plus your MSSQL DB for as low as $3.20/mo and coupon code 5NC25 saves 5% at checkout if you spend $25 or more. I've got the Club and Classifieds hosted with them.
